description:
Barcode
5449000265616

Ingredients
Water, Sugar, Citric Acid, Preservatives (sodium polyphosphate, potassium sorbate, sodium benzoate) and Flavouring

Description
Bonaqua is by definition prepared water and is produced utilising the process of reverse osmosis guaranteeing the enjoyment and quality of the final product. These drinks are water-based and available in tantalising flavours. Carbonation and just the right amount of flavour are added to deliver a fun and refreshing taste.

Product Information
